section.title: Description
section.para: Ticket and appointment calendar notifications can be sent to their recipients using one or multiple methods, each notification can activate the proffered method to be sent, by default the all notifications are sent using the email method, where the information about the notification is embedded into an email for the recipient. but OTRS offers more methods to send this notifications, please take a look below for the configuration and usage of them.

section.title: Notification Web View
section.para: This method is only meant for agents and instead of sending the notifications in any form, they are stored in the system database to be displayed in an special screen in the agent interface.

section.title: Setting up and Using the Notification Web View
section.para: To set up the notification web view for agents, is just as simple as clicking on its activation check-box for each notification.
Once you've enabled the notification web view for a certain notification, agents will see a new icon on top of their screen in OTRS (within the tool-bar) each time a new notification arrives.

figure.title: Notification Web View Icon on the Tool-bar

section.para: Clicking this icon, agents will get an overview of all of their notifications and can read and dismiss them from here.
